text: “Ezɨ puvatɨ, nɨn gumazamiziba nɨ baraghizir puvatɨgha, nɨn akaba batogha, akɨrim ragha nɨn Arazibar Akɨnafarim gasara. Nɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba akar aghuibar gun me mɨgɨa ghaze, Ia bar uan God bagh ua izɨ. Ezɨ me oraghizir puvatɨgha, me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Dughiar avɨribar, me arazir kam gamua nɨn ziam gasɨghasɨsi.
